extendedInfo.description: Memory Match Game.The Memory Match is really fun game. Find a pair for each card and keep track of time. When each pair is matched, you move on to the next level! Each level has its own set of cards.You will improve your memory skills.Try to complete all levels, the further you go the harder it gets.The Memory Match is for kids, but you grown-ups may find it challenging too.You can submit your score online to compete with players all over the world.

reviews.title: Bug?
reviews.comment: In the car challenge i got left with 2 diiferent cars as last. Otherwise beautiful pictures are used and it looks really pretty.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great, addictive game with lots of levels and option to submit your highest score (in case you feel competitive;)
reviews.author: A Google User
